lenders.name: Juliet Chiqui
lenders.loan_because: i've existing small business here in the Philippines; but cannot make it run smoothly due to insufficiency of capital. i'm dealing with almost all government agencies here but cannot cope up with the continuity of supply. there are times that i'm penalized with the delay of delivery 'coz i've to borrow with the loan- sharks which put much load on me. thanks to be given infos of your organization through the oprah show. have tried accessing you way back long time ago only that, due to logistic and resources restraint, i'm doing it just from time to time. thank you for all the help and  praise God having known you.
lenders.occupational_info: as i said, i'm registered with the government electronic procurement since aug 2, 2006. have dealt with them long time ago wheni was still employed. it deems me to do it on my own. now, i know thatif you are of insufficient funds, you'll find it hard to go big. right now, have PO with the Senate of the Phil, BSP (Central Bank of the Phil) etal. don't have any employee other than my husband. i do the marketing and he does the deliveries and collection. we will hire transport only for long distance delivery like Clark Development Corporation.we do the business in the least expenditures. by the time, i'll be provided we the much needed capital, i'll go out of my way to go bidding with the much larger scale. again, my heartfelt gratitude having known you and be one of your benefactors.

lenders.name: Claire G
lenders.occupation: student, work in an office on campus
lenders.loan_because: I really like helping people

lenders.loan_because: We believe in the goodness of people.
lenders.occupational_info:
Doug is a retired public service CEO for the State of Wisconsin who is now a composer of music.  See:  www.mindwormrecords.com.

Marjorie is a retired teacher for the Mount Horeb School Disctrict in Wisconsin who is now a an internationally known clay artist.  See:  www.marjoriekingstudio.com.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped by others in the past and it made a difference in my life. I'm hoping to pass on the same gift to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell property and houses.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
Why wouldn't anyone loan?

It's ridiculous to even have to give a reason.
lenders.occupational_info: I think everyone knows what a doctor does. I specialize in chronic pain and addiction.

lenders.name: Adriana & Susan
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed and double-blessed in our lives.  We want to help others as we have been helped!

lenders.name: Justin Robert Trupp
lenders.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is one of the solutions to global poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Controls for Industrial Furnaces and Boilers.

lenders.name: Raewyn
lenders.loan_because: So I can help someone else to achieve their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I do all the accounts, wages and invoicing for our company.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes you just need a little bit to get you going
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help people to protect thier local environment by controling weeds, planting trees and protcting habitat. I provide resources, advice and support.

lenders.name: Seppo
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea of helping people to help them self.
lenders.occupational_info: San Jose, CA, USA

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people in the developing world who are seeking a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor of international politics at the University of Texas.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.occupational_info: I teach social studies to students aged 15-17.

lenders.name: Multimedia Class
lenders.whereabouts: Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada Nova Scotia
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: This is the start of our donations from our Multimedia class at J.L.Ilsley High School in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: support and love!

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: Each person deserves an opportunity to make a living.  It is wonderful to be part of a grassroots campaign to help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair cars and trucks, for a state organisation.

lenders.name: Corinne
lenders.loan_because: It's such an easy way to make a real difference.

lenders.name: Chiraag
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in alleviating poverty around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I provide consulting services in the areas of strategy and operations

lenders.name: Dulcie
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother of 2 boys, 2 years old and 5 years old.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I think that our economic wealth in the western world is (at least partly) based on impoverishment and excessive indebtedness in poor countrys.  I try to rethink the way we consume, as well as trying to redistribute to those we exploit...
lenders.occupational_info: as I work as a doctor in a rich country, most medical problems I encounter have their origins in obesity, nicotine addiction, overnutrition and a general lack of awareness how precious health is.

lenders.name: 2nd Church MS Kids
lenders.loan_because: We want to give these motivated individuals a chance to make their lives better - at the same time it makes other people's lives better too!

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: We share this planet, let's share the chances...

lenders.name: inUse
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people help themselves. Through KIVA we can follow each individuals journey to achieving their goals and building a better community.
lenders.occupational_info: We create business benefit, by making IT products that the users love.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I've seen the poverty of developing third world countries first hand. I believe in helping those who are less fortunate and this is a great way to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer. I write about what I'm passionate about.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and I want to help other people grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people grow their savings and investments in the stock market.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky and grateful to live in the country and the conditions that I do and would like to give someone else the opportunities that we sometimes take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: We realize that intelligence and ambition is equally distributed throughout the world, but opportunity is not.  (cr: Ray Sorrentini, Fuqua Class of 2011)

lenders.name: Ro Verdeja
lenders.loan_because: This is a practical way of helping/teaching others to fish instead of giving the fish.

lenders.name: Iris
lenders.loan_because: Both of my undergrad and graduate degrees are in business so I see the value of lending to promote the growth and development of small businesses around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial manager

lenders.name: Keith Cotterill
lenders.loan_because: I have supported the Micro Finance movement for years and KIVA is a great way to make this happen. Kiva is cool.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur building technology ventures as an executive, founder and investor in Silicon Valley and the UK.

lenders.name: Burke
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good knowing that I may be able to help another better themselves.

lenders.name: Neahla
lenders.occupation: Sales and Marketing Assistant for a Publisher

lenders.name: Compassion For Change
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all need a chance for a better life. At the "Morados Compassion for Change Foundation", we believe that compassion can bring about the necessary changes to the lives of others and to the world. The world would be such a better place if we showed a little compassion towards one another and towards the human condition.
lenders.occupational_info: I consider myself an investor.

lenders.name: Richard C.
lenders.loan_because: I am fotunate enough to have more than I need, so I wish to share with those who do not have enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the woods, clearing away dead wood, vines and brush that might inhibit the growth of healthy trees.

lenders.name: Whitney
lenders.loan_because: I want to put my efforts toward a good cause.  I see too much wasted on expensive things that leave people void of meaning or purpose in their life.  To devote your time and money to helping others is what will truly give your (and other's) life meaning.  So here I am!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small family office, Mon-Thurs, about 7 hours a day.  I'm an assistant and mainly handle personal errands and tasks for my employer.  On Fridays I volunteer at a women's outreach facility.  I'm hoping to go back to school for nursing very soon.
